Module worldofzuul
Package worldofzuul

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
worldofzuul.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
SpriteAnimation
public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
The type Sprite. Base sprite class containing the functionality of displaying one image.
